name: Help Santa Claus! Drop the Present for xmas!HD
name_original: Help Santa Claus! Drop the Present for xmas!HD
description:
Help Santa Claus!
On the way around the world Santa has to distribute xmas-gifts. Help him and throw the presents into the chimneys.
It starts easy ... but wait and see!
Are you good enough, then buy yourself a new sled!

Attempts to break the high score and compete against your friends!

Have fun wishes
dapion team
